Package ca.concordia.risk.game

Class Card

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.risk.game.Card
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides the implementation of Cards in the Risk game.

    • getCardFromString

      public static Card getCardFromString​(java.lang.String p_cardString)
      Gets the card from its string representation.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      null if the card string was invalid.
